name: UIViewAnimating
desc: An interface for implementing custom animator objects.

items.name: func startAnimation()
items.desc: Starts the animation from its current position.

items.name: func startAnimation(afterDelay: TimeInterval)
items.desc: Starts the animation after the specified delay.

items.name: func pauseAnimation()
items.desc: Pauses a running animation at its current position.

items.name: func stopAnimation(Bool)
items.desc: Stops the animations at their current positions.

items.name: func finishAnimation(at: UIViewAnimatingPosition)
items.desc: Finishes the animations and returns the animator to the inactive state.

items.name: var fractionComplete: CGFloat
items.desc: The completion percentage of the animation.

items.name: var isReversed: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the animation is running in the reverse direction.

items.name: var state: UIViewAnimatingState
items.desc: The current state of the animation.

items.name: var isRunning: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the animation is currently running.

items.name: enum UIViewAnimatingState
items.desc: Constants indicating the current state of the animation.

items.name: enum UIViewAnimatingPosition
items.desc: Constants indicating positions within the animation.
